p: To evaluate the effects of the different climate change scenarios on the spatial distribution of pelicans, we did not include the oceanographic variables. The future climate scenarios corresponded to those proposed by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change ( IPCC, 2014). These scenarios were obtained from the ecoClimate website ( http://ecoclimate.org/), which contains climate models available for different temporal intervals. To do this, we used the model developed by the Community Climate System Model version 4 of the National Center for Atmospheric Research ( Gent et al., 2011). This is due to the good results for the South-East Pacific ( Larson, Pegion & Kirtman, 2018; Zheng et al., 2018).
